issue.title: [C++][Dev] Improve Array preview in GDB plugin
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15389](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15389). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the GDB plugin will print basic information about arrays:
```Java

(gdb) p int32_array
$175 = arrow::Int32Array of length 4, null count 1
```

It would be nice to perhaps display a previsualization of the **data** contained in the array, at least for simple types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15389?focusedCommentId=17489801) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12315
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12315>
